scripts.dev:local: concurrently "cross-env FLOW_NETWORK=local expo start"  "npm run flow:dev" "npm run flow:emulator" "npm run flow:dev-wallet" --default-input-target 0 --raw
scripts.dev:local:deploy: flow project deploy --network=emulator --update && cross-env FLOW_NETWORK=local expo start
scripts.dev:testnet:deploy: flow project deploy --network=testnet --update && cross-env FLOW_NETWORK=testnet expo start
scripts.flow:dev: wait-on tcp:8888 tcp:8701 tcp:3000 && flow dev
